page.title: 16FOOD.
page.content: THE CHILDREN IN MY CLASS USUALLY HAVE CEREAL, TOAST, BREAD, BACON AND EGGS FOR{BREAKFAST}WITH A DRINK OF TEA COFFEE,OR ORANGE JUICE. FOR{LUNCH}MOST OF THEM HAVE SCHOOL MEALS LIKE CHIPS, SAUSAGES AND BEANS. PUDDING IS USUALLY CHOCOLATE CRUNCH OR BUNS. SOME PEOPLE HAVE A{PACKED LUNCH}INSTEAD. A PACKED LUNCH IS OFTEN SANDWICHES, CRISPS AND BISCUITS WITH AN APPLE AND A DRINK OF ORANGE OR LEMON. WHEN THE CHILDREN GET{HOME FROM {SCHOOL}THEY USUALLY HAVE A BISCUIT OR A PIECE OF CAKE. WHEN ALL THE FAMILY COME HOME THEY HAVE THEIR{DINNER.}THIS CAN BE PORK CHOPS OR PIES OR SPAGHETTI BOLOGNESE. A FEW OF THE CHILDREN HAVE A{LITTLE SNACK}BEFORE THEY GO TO BED WHICH IS USUALLY A PIECE OF CAKE AND A MILKY DRINK.{MY FAVOURITE MEAL}IS ROAST MEAT, ROAST POTATOES AND CABBAGE WITH CHOCOLATE WHIP FOR PUDDING.
